abstract: House Judiciary Committee releases visa application submitted by Syed Rizwan Farook for his wife Tashfeen Malik that she used to come to United States in July 2014; documents offer first explanation of how Farook met and married Pakistani woman with whom he carried out San Bernardino, Calif, massacre.
lead_paragraph: Syed Rizwan Farook said he and Tashfeen Malik had met on a website and had become engaged after “several weeks of emailing” in an application for her fiancée visa to the United States.

headline.main: Visa Form Adds Details on How San Bernardino Attacker Met Wife
headline.print_headline: Visa Form Adds Details on How San Bernardino Attacker Met Wife

snippet: Syed Rizwan Farook said he and Tashfeen Malik had met on a website and had become engaged after “several weeks of emailing” in an application for her fiancée visa to the United States.
